Interface HttpSenderConfigurationBuilder

    ConfigurationBuilder

    public interface HttpSenderConfigurationBuilder
extends ConfigurationBuilder

      Set custom HTTP headers to be sent by the provided HttpSender This should be used also by third party senders.
